description: ExtProcProcessingMode defines if and how headers and bodies are sent to the service. https://www.envoyproxy.io/docs/envoy/latest/api-v3/extensions/filters/http/ext_proc/v3/processing_mode.proto#envoy-v3-api-msg-extensions-filters-http-ext-proc-v3-processingmode

request.description: Defines processing mode for requests. If present, request headers are sent. Request body is processed according to the specified mode.

response.description: Defines processing mode for responses. If present, response headers are sent. Response body is processed according to the specified mode.
